#!/usr/bin/env python
import sys

def handleCase(pies, racks):
    ret = 0

    pies.sort()
    racks.sort()
    while pies != [] and racks != []:
        if pies[-1] <= racks[-1]:
            pies.pop()
            racks.pop()
            ret += 1
        else:
            pies.pop()
    return ret

def go():
    T = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
    for t in xrange(0, T):
        N = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
        pies = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().strip().split(' ')]
        racks = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().strip().split(' ')]
        print handleCase(pies, racks)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    go()
